    <div class="d-md-flex gutter-md">
      <div class="col-md-8 col-lg-9">
          <div class="border rounded-1 box-shadow bg-white p-4 mb-5">

  <div class="markdown-body f5 mb-2">
    <p>Testing is the practice of systematically testing software to make sure it works. Testing can be iterative, and happen multiple times.</p><p>Eliminate bugs and ship with more confidence by adding these tools to your workflow.</p>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p><strong>Tell us about your environment:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Puppeteer version: 1.14</li>
<li>Platform / OS version:  Windows</li>
<li>Node.js version: 10</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>What steps will reproduce the problem?</strong><br>
try to pass a promise to <code>await page.waitForResponse(response =&gt; condition)</code>  instead of <code>urlOrPredicate</code>.</p>
<p><strong>What is the expected result?</strong><br>
expect async function to work</p>
<p><strong>What happens instead?</strong><br>
no waiting as promise</p>

              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  levelingup
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-12-24T21:25:57Z" class="no-wrap">Dec 24, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>I tried to follow the initial steps from here: <a href="https://www.learnstorybook.com/intro-to-storybook/react/en/get-started/" rel="nofollow">https://www.learnstorybook.com/intro-to-storybook/react/en/get-started/</a></p>
<p>running:</p>
<pre><code>npx create-react-app taskbox
cd taskbox
</code></pre>
<p>Then when I ran:<br>
<code>npx -p @storybook/cli sb init</code></p>
<p>I get the error  <code>TypeError: Cannot set property 'storybook' of undefined</code></p>
<p>This is the full message in my terminal:</p>
<pre><code> sb init - the simplest way to add a
</code></pre>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/goldbergyoni/nodebestpractices/issues/620" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:555163924,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="91863e88b65a1ad9e8fb330298e85d61b065ff8bfab4978e89aa24c276ab5b03" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Docker best practices - call for ideas
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="goldbergyoni"
              src="https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/8571500?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  goldbergyoni
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-01-26T01:31:30Z" class="no-wrap">Jan 25, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Given the immense popularity of Docker and the need to harden it different per platform (see ideas below) - we'd like to start writing a Docker best practices section.</p>
<p>You're welcome to contribute ideas and write best practices - writing and brainstorming will people is an amazing way to deepen your Docker understanding.</p>
<p>At first, we want to collect ideas for best practices, solidify a list</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:555163924,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="60be5ead0d2d82dc268db5dc3aa1693100f4ddb4df51bc8a5d24b33faf7603c0" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/goldbergyoni/nodebestpractices/issues/620">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Note: This is fundamentally working as intended, this issue is now about validating the config and providing a sufficient warning.</p>
<h2><g-emoji class="g-emoji" alias="bug" fallback-src="https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f41b.png">🐛</g-emoji> Bug Report</h2>
<p>The configuration <code>testSequencer</code> (<a href="https://jestjs.io/docs/en/configuration#testsequencer-string" rel="nofollow">https://jestjs.io/docs/en/configuration#testsequencer-string</a>) is silently ignored in <code>projects</code> (<a href="https://jestjs.io/docs/en/configuration#projects-arraystring--projectconfig" rel="nofollow">https://jestjs.io/docs/en/configuration#projects-arraystring--projectconfig</a>)</p>
<h2>To Reproduce</h2>
<p>Run this config</p>

                  <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/facebook/jest/issues/9105" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;LITTLE_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:512874424,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="ab93bc8d8e1a40f40090dd8d759c3dedb74e90c0155a7009120161afbfd9458e" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:small;">
                    Create a Dockerfile for contributing
</a>

                </h1>

              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-03-31T12:49:33Z" class="no-wrap">Mar 31, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <h3>Current behavior:</h3>
<p>We use <code>--env</code> variable to pass some environment variables to cypress, when it's running both in headless and headed mode.</p>
<p>One of the parameters is a hash (mix of numbers and characters). Surprisingly some specific hash values make cypress to fail reading this value from the command line (e.g. <code>769e98018</code>). The corresponding environment variable is not set and the `Cyp</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:591081450,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="aff5c409335a5233243d90cba28a9247f0197efb45015ece08de3fde7ec5e440" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/cypress-io/cypress/issues/6891">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/mochajs/mocha/issues/4228" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:599900258,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="503cc92f866da29771bfb544a7a1b38fe604847ee46cc1e8a9a0f646f1e129bb" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                lint the jsdoc
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="boneskull"
              src="https://avatars3.githubusercontent.com/u/924465?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  boneskull
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-14T22:37:05Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 14, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>I'm getting bit with failing documentation builds because I'm writing docstrings that JSDoc doesn't like (specifically, TS-style).  But there's no linting happening before getting to Netlify.</p>
<p>We may be able to make JSDoc just check the syntax and exit (and make it part of the <code>lint</code> scripts).</p>
<p>This is moot if we want to move forward with maintaining our own TS types (for which there is an op</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"

</a>                  </div>

            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  Adrianjewell91
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-07T18:54:56Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 7, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <h3>Current behavior</h3>
<p>Hello, I would simply like to request that the documentation for <code>find()</code> (<a href="https://enzymejs.github.io/enzyme/docs/api/ShallowWrapper/find.html" rel="nofollow">https://enzymejs.github.io/enzyme/docs/api/ShallowWrapper/find.html</a>) be updated to reflect its snapshot-nature. For example, in a situation where clicking a button updates state under the hood...</p>
<pre><code>   // some set up code goes here. 

    const deleteButton = wrapper.find('[data-enzyme-id
</code></pre>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:596081365,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="be76e109601c609d1ee808a39009f7c2733c45bb50ed4d5c12af311683bef27e" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/enzymejs/enzyme/issues/2367">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/avajs/ava/issues/2455" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:599348372,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="3d4c74d5a0647859738df584c4161ffa2411f0725c1cf32299c561cdc4a774d3" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Have assertions return booleans
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

              12
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="novemberborn"
              src="https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/33538?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  novemberborn
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-14T07:11:58Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 14, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Spurred by conversation in <a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="597501261" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url="https://github.com/avajs/ava/issues/2449" data-hovercard-type="issue" data-hovercard-url="/avajs/ava/issues/2449/hovercard" href="https://github.com/avajs/ava/issues/2449">avajs/ava#2449</a> and <a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="248741898" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url="https://github.com/avajs/ava/issues/1485" data-hovercard-type="issue" data-hovercard-url="/avajs/ava/issues/1485/hovercard" href="https://github.com/avajs/ava/issues/1485">avajs/ava#1485</a> we'd like for our assertions to return booleans. <code>true</code> when they pass, <code>false</code> when they fail. This does not apply to the <code>throws()</code> and <code>throwsAsync()</code> assertions.</p>
<p>Failing assertions will fail the test, but do not throw exceptions. This means your test does not stop executing. Usua</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/jasmine/jasmine/issues/1811" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:604287327,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="3c2c38880ab02298175a4a46a1161a72acc78d2129f350251b9bab1c2367baa2" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                expect...toEqual doesn&#39;t check for symbol keys
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="crfrolik"
              src="https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/60711200?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  crfrolik
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-21T21:09:20Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 21, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <h2>Expected Behavior</h2>


<pre><code>const sym = Symbol('foo');
expect({}).toEqual({[sym]: 'foo'});
</code></pre>
<p>This test should fail. It currently passes.</p>
<h2>Current Behavior</h2>


                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:604287327,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="da16452a6e48173647e2d2edc7bbbd9a808e3920304a280b06fc1bbc1d2d17ec" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/jasmine/jasmine/issues/1811">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  XSAM
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-12-26T09:37:31Z" class="no-wrap">Dec 26, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>The go build command in the <a href="https://github.com/buger/goreplay/wiki/Compilation">Compilation Wiki</a> will throw complaints.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>#Compile from source<br>
cd $HOME/gocode/src/github.com/buger/gor<br>
go build LDFLAGS = -ldflags "-extldflags "-static""</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell"><pre>$ go build LDFLAGS = -ldflags <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>-extldflags <span class="pl-cce">\"</span>-static<span class="pl-cce">\"</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
can<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">'</span>t load package: package LDFLAGS: malformed module path "LDFLAGS": missing dot </span></pre></div>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:542499286,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="e747ad9ad1e787e594fa8853c0c1ffa03ba80c1ff27e88e20dcf8c182164898c" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/buger/goreplay/issues/722">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/catchorg/Catch2/issues/1892" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:587024846,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="033e8026b0a185e67c92f5f34b76122468e413cc15798ecee43d9c0563c59856" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Missing CATCH_ TEMPLATE_LIST_TEST_CASE and CATCH_ TEMPLATE_LIST_TEST_CASE_METHOD
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="philsquared"
              src="https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/92878?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  philsquared
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-03-24T15:00:31Z" class="no-wrap">Mar 24, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p><strong>Describe the bug</strong><br>
When <code>TEMPLATE_LIST_TEST_CASE</code> and <code>TEMPLATE_LIST_TEST_CASE_METHOD</code> were added, the corresponding versions with the <code>CATCH_</code> prefix were missed.</p>
<p><strong>Expected behavior</strong><br>
<code>CATCH_TEMPLATE_LIST_TEST_CASE</code> and <code>CATCH_TEMPLATE_LIST_TEST_CASE_METHOD</code> should be available.</p>
<p><strong>Additional context</strong></p>
<p>The commit that added <code>TEMPLATE_LIST_TEST_CASE</code> and `TEMPLATE_LIST_TEST_CASE_MET</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:587024846,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="6b200d3f017b85f8ee8d46516432359bc946c7668fa941697773aaaa149eb144" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/catchorg/Catch2/issues/1892">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>

              <div class="labels lh-condensed">

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>In this section (which needs a little grammar tidying as well), the <code>code .</code> command is not enabled by default, so doesn't immediately work as a check that Visual Studio Code is installed correctly: <a href="https://quii.gitbook.io/learn-go-with-tests/go-fundamentals/install-go#go-editor" rel="nofollow">https://quii.gitbook.io/learn-go-with-tests/go-fundamentals/install-go#go-editor</a></p>
<p>Visual Studio includes instructions for enabling this wonderful shortcut here: <a href="https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/set" rel="nofollow">https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/set</a></p>

                  <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/quii/learn-go-with-tests/issues/309" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;LITTLE_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:546391831,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="3883eca31765b4b62970044eb615b6c8dbac54358c01f8025b3f0a0ae8c1cdc9" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:small;">
                    Style nits

              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-24T04:59:19Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 23, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>As a new end user, I cannot find a single user guide or decent documentation. The javadoc reads like it's written as a quick review for someone who already knows the ins/outs of Mockito and just need some sample code. I don't even know what or how Mockito works and the first couple of lines are talking about "mockito inline".</p>
<p>Most open source projects have really great user guides and document</p>

                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/stretchr/testify/issues/925" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:601013438,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="f9319852691b3cbf2f61abf1b7d5bbf9a675b925aa805ed424ef0a288081bcf4" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Http Assertions does not allow the creation of a body
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

              6
            </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="ihulsbus"
              src="https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/11390889?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  ihulsbus
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-16T12:35:07Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 16, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Hi,</p>
<p>It seems like the HTTP Assert package does not allow me to specify a body to pass in a POST request for example. Looking at the <code>HTTPBody()</code> function, the body argument is set to <code>nil</code>:<br>
<code>req, err := http.NewRequest(method, url+"?"+values.Encode(), nil)</code></p>
<p>Is this by design, or am I looking at a missing feature?</p>
<p>Cheers,</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <ul>
<li>Faker version: 1.0.7</li>
<li>OS: Ubuntu 16.04</li>
</ul>
<p>I was wondering if it is possible to generate a list of 'n'  unique company names? I saw some PR's which gave a unique keyword for 'words' but doesn't seem to extend to other providers? I understand i could just keep regenerating and dropping duplicates until I got a unique set of length n, but would be nice to just have a keyword for that (plus this m</p>

</span>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/httpbin/issues/598" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:563478507,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="82a44e01929c669b6419a21cc0eeb8193848bdc98556b3ee7529e10cead4e291" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                bytes endpoint with seed not stable between python 2 and python 3
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="rajsite"
              src="https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/1588923?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  rajsite
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-02-11T21:09:25Z" class="no-wrap">Feb 11, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>I'm upgrading a build environment from python 2 to python 3 and noticed that endpoints with seeded random numbers are not returning the same values. It seems to be related to usage of randint:<br>
<a href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/httpbin/blob/f8ec666b4d1b654e4ff6aedd356f510dcac09f83/httpbin/core.py#L1448">https://github.com/postmanlabs/httpbin/blob/f8ec666b4d1b654e4ff6aedd356f510dcac09f83/httpbin/core.py#L1448</a></p>
<p>It seems like randint is not seed safe and it looks like only random() is: <a href="https://bugs.python.o" rel="nofollow">https://bugs.python.o</a></p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:563478507,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="eefe3ffc297cb57ac9498821ee77e6e4568092f40f7249fa3ef81f6715f0af2e" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/postmanlabs/httpbin/issues/598">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>

              </span>

              <div class="labels lh-condensed">
              </div>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/Quick/Quick/issues/941" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:538760966,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="9469376b34de74d01f7dd676fc2934ffc19658a5266448c7a0870a96c99d2c7b" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                [documentation] iOS 13 no longer seems to trigger viewDidAppear when calling endAppearanceTransition in unit tests

                  <ul class="contains-task-list">
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" checked=""> I have read <a href="https://github.com/Quick/Quick/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md">CONTRIBUTING</a> and have done my best to follow them.</li>
</ul>
<h3>What did you do?</h3>
<p>In Xcode 10.2.1 (iOS 12.4), in order to trigger <code>viewDidAppear</code> logic did the following:</p>
<pre><code>    let viewController = ViewController()
    let _ = viewController.view
    let window = UIWindow(frame: UIScreen.main.bounds)
    window.la
</code></pre>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:538760966,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="dbf36ee329b92ff89f674b2badc2915aed50d203c55df7248826a458db0077f3" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/Quick/Quick/issues/941">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/phpstan/phpstan/issues/3161" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:598501466,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="4bd74a2cffa5c374614f2f741d766bdbd105824354648ba41e70ee2ae8a6a863" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">

          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"

            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  vladyslavstartsev
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-04-12T14:47:35Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 12, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <h1>Feature request</h1>

<p>I found that phpstan doesn't understand psalms numeric-string type (see <a href="https://psalm.dev/docs/annotating_code/type_syntax/scalar_types/#numeric-string" rel="nofollow">https://psalm.dev/docs/annotating_code/type_syntax/scalar_types/#numeric-string</a>)<br>
It would be nice to support it.</p>
<p>here is playground link<br>
<a href="https://phpstan.org/r/9e26dfae-706f-4e3a" rel="nofollow">https://phpstan.org/r/9e26dfae-706f-4e3a</a></p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:598501466,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="e2f4f025f03584b73dfcc48cb9fd85a9d991d6f3eaf896f3293c536125e3d629" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/phpstan/phpstan/issues/3161">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/goldbergyoni/javascript-testing-best-practices/issues/26" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:481925968,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="d8fcdde1cdcfbf7e87894fc4399bcdc11ec46006e9bd674d3ecabf62d1077ea9" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Section 1.1 example code should check for true, not false
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

              2
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="BruceWilliams"
              src="https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/389656?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  BruceWilliams
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-08-17T21:01:02Z" class="no-wrap">Aug 17, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>The second example in section 1.1 says:</p>
<p><code>expect(result.approved).to.be.false;</code></p>
<p>It should be:</p>
<p><code>expect(result.approved).to.be.true;</code></p>
<p>(I'm guessing you made it false so you could simulate the error output in the next picture.)</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >

              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/thoughtbot/factory_bot/issues/1292" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:438565573,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="42fa1c11fb11b348f37d4783b22c7b4f4b5397e57432a281c307cd91b463d886" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">

          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"

          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  fsateler
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-04-30T00:56:10Z" class="no-wrap">Apr 29, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>I have searched the issue list for something similar, but I have not found the exact same issue.</p>
<p>The problem is that, given these two models:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-ruby"><pre><span class="pl-en">factory</span> <span class="pl-pds">:employee</span> <span class="pl-k">do</span>
  <span class="pl-c"># various attributes</span>
<span class="pl-k">end</span>

<span class="pl-en">factory</span> <span class="pl-pds">:job</span> <span class="pl-k">do</span>
  <span class="pl-en">association</span> <span class="pl-pds">:employee</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-pds">strategy</span>: <span class="pl-pds">:build</span>
<span class="pl-k">end</span></pre></div>
<p><code>attributes_for</code> ignores any explicit <code>employee</code> assignments:</p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-ruby"><pre><span class="pl-en">attributes_for</span><span class="pl-kos">(</span><span class="pl-pds">:job</span><span class="pl-kos">,</span> <span class="pl-pds">employee</span>: <span class="pl-en">some_other_em</span><span class="pl-kos"></span></pre></div>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:438565573,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="b68afe210b12a7248e9bc8763cd6329f6f1cef0c8eab294a57b9542fce85b76d" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/thoughtbot/factory_bot/issues/1292">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p><strong>Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.</strong><br>
This is releated to <a href="https://github.com/wix/Detox/blob/master/docs/Guide.Mocking.md">this</a>.</p>
<p>I believe documentation on the topic of mocking is outdated. I'm quite new to React Native and it took me a while until I figured that <a href="https://facebook.github.io/metro/docs/en/configuration" rel="nofollow">current version of metro</a> does not support `r</p>

                  <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/wix/Detox/issues/1306" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;LITTLE_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:434543776,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="b1fe5f5c0440ba1bbd1b9e21bc29230c76340904c784e0bdf7d615a15333a1f6" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:small;">
                    allow all settings to be defined without cli arguments
</a>

                </h1>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>I thought I'd give some feedback on how the <a href="https://reactcosmos.org" rel="nofollow">https://reactcosmos.org</a> could be better, I'm happy to help with some of these items, but better to write them down and discuss them first.</p>
<ul class="contains-task-list">
<li class="task-list-item"><input type="checkbox" id="" disabled="" class="task-list-item-checkbox" checked=""> The website works really well as a marketing site right now, but it doesn't really capitalize on that by calling users to action. It should tell them to "Get Started" or "Install" with either a big button to</li>
</ul>

                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest/issues/6973" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:588759998,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="2aa6ebc28123de47dd05fe8446d0206311d9c5daf719eed311f3c123dfe5ad16" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Class Method teardown() is Called by pytest, even though it is not documented
</a>

            </h1>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="szegel"
              src="https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/47897897?v=4"
              width="32"

          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  szegel
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2020-03-26T22:11:26Z" class="no-wrap">Mar 26, 2020</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>According to your documentation (<a href="https://docs.pytest.org/en/latest/xunit_setup.html" rel="nofollow">https://docs.pytest.org/en/latest/xunit_setup.html</a>), I can name a method teardown() in a test class, and it should not get run by pytest. I am using version pytest-3.8.2.</p>
<p>Pytest calls a method called teardown on class destruction even though it is specified as teardown_class in your documentation.  I am guessing this accidentally did not get removed, when the na</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:588759998,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="acbe4b60ab38f19a1389fcfd14cacba6a3f182627cb2a266eccd2edb5c00cb5a" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest/issues/6973">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

              <div class="labels lh-condensed">

              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/niieani/bash-oo-framework/issues/80" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:407495606,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="952f3bbbb6b2eeaddd0bae3aaafc7e9218dee7d342469fef8dbeacb8373dbe6a" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                update readme instructions for namedParameters
</a>

            </h1>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="archgroove"
              src="https://avatars0.githubusercontent.com/u/9814593?v=4"

          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  archgroove
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-02-07T00:38:54Z" class="no-wrap">Feb 6, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>This stackoverflow post outlines a different method of using namedParameters than the readme and seems to be correct. Readme could be updated to match.</p>
<p><a href="https://stackoverflow.com/questions/6212219/passing-parameters-to-a-bash-function" rel="nofollow">https://stackoverflow.com/questions/6212219/passing-parameters-to-a-bash-function</a></p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:407495606,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="3cc76a2015e3a085cb4b7395bfbf465d29bc3135a80439768a88e0602b947e8e" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/niieani/bash-oo-framework/issues/80">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>

              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">

    </nav>
  </div>

            <h1 class="d-inline flex-auto f3 text-normal lh-condensed">
              <a class="text-gray-dark" href="https://github.com/robotframework/robotframework/issues/3240" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;BIG_GOOD_FIRST_ISSUE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:467251569,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="ba39667e730ea420d14c6a8da6e9c3942055c478a8d3ea10f6752694522b784d" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;size:large;">
                Add trim parameter to Should Be Equal As Strings keyword
</a>

            </h1>
          </div>

            <div class="f6 text-gray text-right no-wrap mt-1 ml-3">
              <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-comment text-gray mr-1" color="gray" mr="1" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.75 2.5C2.6837 2.5 2.62011 2.52634 2.57322 2.57322C2.52634 2.62011 2.5 2.6837 2.5 2.75V10.25C2.5 10.388 2.612 10.5 2.75 10.5H4.75C4.94891 10.5 5.13968 10.579 5.28033 10.7197C5.42098 10.8603 5.5 11.0511 5.5 11.25V13.44L8.22 10.72C8.36052 10.5793 8.55115 10.5002 8.75 10.5H13.25C13.3163 10.5 13.3799 10.4737 13.4268 10.4268C13.4737 10.3799 13.5 10.3163 13.5 10.25V2.75C13.5 2.6837 13.4737 2.62011 13.4268 2.57322C13.3799 2.52634 13.3163 2.5 13.25 2.5H2.75ZM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H13.25C14.216 1 15 1.784 15 2.75V10.25C15 10.7141 14.8156 11.1592 14.4874 11.4874C14.1592 11.8156 13.7141 12 13.25 12H9.06L6.487 14.573C6.28324 14.7767 6.02367 14.9153 5.74111 14.9715C5.45854 15.0277 5.16567 14.9988 4.8995 14.8886C4.63333 14.7784 4.40581 14.5917 4.24571 14.3522C4.08561 14.1127 4.0001 13.8311 4 13.543V12H2.75C2.28587 12 1.84075 11.8156 1.51256 11.4874C1.18437 11.1592 1 10.7141 1 10.25V2.75Z"></path></svg>

              16
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="d-flex">
          <div class="mr-3">
            <img
              class="avatar avatar-user avatar-small"
              alt="lucielavickova"
              src="https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/16803915?v=4"
              width="32"
              height="32"
            >
          </div>
          <div class="flex-auto" style="width: 80%;">
            <div class="Box Box--condensed position-relative timeline-comment--caret">
              <div class="Box-header f6 text-gray">
                <strong class="text-gray-dark text-bold">
                  lucielavickova
                </strong>

                  commented

                <relative-time datetime="2019-07-12T06:52:47Z" class="no-wrap">Jul 12, 2019</relative-time>
              </div>

                <div class="Box-body comment-body markdown-body position-relative overflow-hidden pt-3" style="max-height:200px">
                  <p>Would it be possible to add "<strong>trim</strong>" parameter to keyword "<strong>Should Be Equal As Strings</strong>" (+related keywords)?<br>
Many times I need to compare two strings, but there are some trailing or leading whitespaces in the actual value, which I don't care about, so I always have to trim them before. Having trim as a parameter in these keywords would help me a lot :)</p>

                  <div
                    class="position-absolute right-0 left-0 bottom-0 text-center"
                    style="background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(255,255,255,1), rgba(255,255,255,0));"
                  >
                    <a class="btn btn-outline btn-sm mx-auto my-3" data-hydro-click="{&quot;event_type&quot;:&quot;explore.click&quot;,&quot;payload&quot;:{&quot;click_context&quot;:&quot;REPOSITORY_CARD&quot;,&quot;click_target&quot;:&quot;ISSUE&quot;,&quot;click_visual_representation&quot;:&quot;READ_MORE&quot;,&quot;actor_id&quot;:60628828,&quot;record_id&quot;:467251569,&quot;originating_url&quot;:&quot;https://github.com/topics/testing&quot;,&quot;user_id&quot;:60628828}}" data-hydro-click-hmac="2bd91517160378d27fd4240f25a025f5ccfe68ee32a8907afd177746715ff7b0" data-ga-click="Explore, go to issue, location:good first issues;text:read more;size:large;" href="https://github.com/robotframework/robotframework/issues/3240">
                      Read more
</a>                  </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="mt-3">
              <span class="discussion-item-icon border-white-fade-15 ml-0 mr-2">
                <svg height="16" class="octicon octicon-tag" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" aria-hidden="true"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M2.5 7.775V2.75C2.5 2.6837 2.52634 2.62011 2.57322 2.57322C2.62011 2.52634 2.6837 2.5 2.75 2.5H7.775C7.80785 2.49994 7.84039 2.50636 7.87077 2.51888C7.90114 2.53141 7.92874 2.5498 7.952 2.573L14.202 8.823C14.2253 8.84622 14.2438 8.87381 14.2564 8.90418C14.269 8.93456 14.2754 8.96712 14.2754 9C14.2754 9.03288 14.269 9.06544 14.2564 9.09582C14.2438 9.12619 14.2253 9.15378 14.202 9.177L9.177 14.202C9.15378 14.2253 9.12619 14.2438 9.09582 14.2564C9.06544 14.269 9.03288 14.2754 9 14.2754C8.96712 14.2754 8.93456 14.269 8.90418 14.2564C8.87381 14.2438 8.84622 14.2253 8.823 14.202L2.573 7.952C2.5498 7.92874 2.53141 7.90114 2.51888 7.87077C2.50636 7.84039 2.49994 7.80785 2.5 7.775ZM1 7.775V2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1H7.775C8.239 1 8.685 1.184 9.013 1.513L15.263 7.763C15.5909 8.09115 15.7751 8.53609 15.7751 9C15.7751 9.46391 15.5909 9.90885 15.263 10.237L10.237 15.263C9.90885 15.5909 9.46391 15.7751 9 15.7751C8.53609 15.7751 8.09115 15.5909 7.763 15.263L1.513 9.013C1.35035 8.85047 1.22133 8.65747 1.1333 8.44505C1.04528 8.23263 0.999983 8.00494 1 7.775ZM6 5C5.73478 5 5.48043 5.10536 5.29289 5.29289C5.10536 5.48043 5 5.73478 5 6C5 6.26522 5.10536 6.51957 5.29289 6.70711C5.48043 6.89464 5.73478 7 6 7C6.26522 7 6.51957 6.89464 6.70711 6.70711C6.89464 6.51957 7 6.26522 7 6C7 5.73478 6.89464 5.48043 6.70711 5.29289C6.51957 5.10536 6.26522 5 6 5Z"></path></svg>
